review: My cable company shut me off and I wanted a better solution.  I tried the Google Chromecast, but didn't like it.  I ordered the Amazon Fire TV Stick and it's been great!!  I get to watch my favorite shows in HD and listen to music for a fraction of what I paid for cable!!!

review: This is a wonderful device.  I love voice detach and it really does work. It streams movies and tv shows very fast I have had problems with other streaming boxes buffering the problem disappeared with the fire tv plus I also bought the game controller and the grandkids love that they can play some of the games from their kindle fire on the big screen.  I highly recommend and I will be buying more for gifts
